message: I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you, Bob. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm very interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer the product to you for $1050000. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget with $1050000. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer the product to you for $1000000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget with $1000000. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at this price.

I'm not willing to go as low as $975000, Bob. I think the product's value is worth more than that, considering what you've been willing to pay in the past. I'll offer it to you for $1025000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in it.

Alice, I understand that you think the product's value is worth more than my previous offers, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping you can meet me at this price.

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer the product to you for $1050000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
